mapper.insert: insert into bc_member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_nickname, option_agree) values (#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_phone}, #{member_nickname}, #{option_agree})
mapper.select: select * from bc_member where member_id=#{member_id} and member_pw=#{member_pw} and member_del=0
select count(*) from bc_member where member_id=#{member_id}
select count(*) from bc_member where member_nickname=#{member_nickname}
select * from bc_member where member_name=#{member_name} and member_phone=#{member_phone}
